WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.ELASTIC_BANNER.HINT: Elastic banner is re-sized and cropped to fill entire header area, suitable for abstract banners. Inelastic banner is re-sized, but not cropped, suitable for banners with text.
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.LOGO.HINT:
Logo displayed on screen at left-top corner.
Optimal Settings:
Format: PNG
Size: 600+ px
Aspect Ratio: variable
Background: transparent
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.LOGO_PRINT.HINT:
Printable logo for invoice and other documents. Should look good on white background.
Optimal Settings:
Format: PNG
Size: 600+ px
Aspect Ratio: variable
Background: transparent
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.ICON.HINT:
Square icon used as browser favicon, app shortcut icon, mobile app icon, etc. Recommended minimalistic design without small text.
Optimal Settings:
Format: PNG
Size: 512x512+ px
Aspect Ratio: 1:1
Background: transparent
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.BANNER.HINT:
Wide horizontal image for top banner.
Optimal Settings:
Format: JPEG
Size: 1200x200+ px
Aspect Ratio: 6:1
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.MEMBER_DIRECTORY_URL.HINT: This link is displayed in User Profile / Login Information. If empty, it's hidden.
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.CONTACT_URL.HINT: This link is displayed in sidebar for members and non-members instead of SUPPORT link for coordinators.
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.TERMS_OF_SERVICE_URL.HINT: This link is displayed in the 1st step of member self-registration. User has to agree via checkbox.
WHITE_LABEL_SETTINGS.RESERVATION_AGREEMENT_URL.HINT: This link is displayed each time non-member reserves via Book It Now or Simple Reservation wizard. User has to agree via checkbox.
